column3: I am a bit confused with the squashing process. How should I fix the current state of the PR?

git merge upstream/master
git reset --soft upstream/master
git commit -m 'net: Denote some CNode functions const'
git push origin master -f

On Thu, Jun 1, 2017 at 4:42 PM, pavlosantoniou <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I am a bit confused with the squashing process. How should I fix the
> current state of the PR?

Thank you! The commits are squashed now.

Change seems fine to me, but why just this function? \nTo avoid a PR per function might be a bit more thorough and do this for the entire class.\nE.g. it looks like `GetRefCount` above, for example, is also missing const?
Done, a commit for GetRefCount() is now part of the same PR
